name: Hingey Truck
description:
Hingey Truck is a puzzle driving game where you drive and back a truck into a progressively harder series of challenges. It's controller-based and uses an innovative steering mechanic that mimics real-life truck steering controls. 

The lightly guided nature of the challenges gives the player a starting point and a goal position to solve each maneuver-but there are as many ways to get this truck backed in as there are players! 

Requires a PS4 or Xbox One Controller to play.
